look_3_cards: Look at 3 random cards from your opponent's hand.
pick_torrential_rain: Pick a Torrential Rain card from your deck and play it instantly.
draw_from_discard_pile: Draw a card from your opponent's discard pile.
restore_from_discard_pile: Restore a card from your discard pile to your hand.
double_close_combat_power: Double the strength of all your Close Combat units (unless a Commander's horn is also present on that row).
discard_and_draw_cards: Discard 2 card and draw 1 card of your choice from your deck.
pick_weather_and_play: Pick any weather card from your deck and play it instantly.
pick_fog_and_play: Pick an Impenetrable Fog card from your deck and play it instantly.
clear_weather: Clear any weather effects (resulting from Biting Frost, Torrential Rain or Impenetrable Fog cards) in play.
double_siege_power: Doubles the strength of all your Siege units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).
destroy_strongest_siege: Destroy your enemy's strongest Siege unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Siege units is 10 or more.
draw_extra_card: Draw an extra card at the beginning of the battle.
pick_frost_and_play: Pick a Biting Frost card from your deck and play it instantly.
destroy_strongest_close: Destroy your enemy's strongest Close Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Close Combat units is 10 or more.
double_ranged_power: Doubles the strength of all your Ranged Combat units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).
